    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120429</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120429</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Določi spremembo v  frekvenci, ki bi jo slišal, ko bi mimo peljal policijski avto</string>
            <string language="en">Determine the change in frequency you will hear as the police car goes by.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie die Änderung in der Frequenz fest, 
die Sie hören, wie das Polizeiauto vorbei geht.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez le changement de la fréquence que 
vous entendrez comme la voiture de police va près.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine a mudança na freqüência que você se
ouvirá como o carro das polícias vai perto.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini il cambiamento nella frequenza che vi 
sentirete come l'automobile della polizia va vicino.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε την αλλαγή στη συχνότητα που θα ακούσετε 
καθώς το αυτοκίνητο αστυνομίας περνά.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine el cambio en frecuencia que usted oirá
como va el coche del policía cerca.</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Stojiš ob avtocesti, po kateri pelje policijski avto z vključeno sireno.</string>
            <string language="en">A police car with is siren on drives by an observer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dopplerjev pojav</string>
            <string language="en">doppler effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zvok</string>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Polizeiauto mit ist Sirene auf Laufwerken durch einen 
Beobachter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une voiture de police avec est sirène sur des lecteurs 
par un observateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um carro das polícias com é siren em movimentações por
um observador.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un automobile della polizia con è sirena sugli 
azionamenti da un osservatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα αυτοκίνητο αστυνομίας με είναι σειρήνα στις 
κινήσεις από έναν παρατηρητή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un coche del policía con es sirena en mecanismos 
impulsores de un observador.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Doppler Effekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">effet de Doppler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bruit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">efeito de doppler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">som</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">effetto di doppler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">efecto de Doppler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sonido</string>
          </keyword>
